title: S15 Ep95: Holzer's Ghosts - Death to Tyrants Edition w/ Coby Treadway
itunes:title: Holzer's Ghosts - Death to Tyrants Edition w/ Coby Treadway
description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - Death to Tyrants Edition with guest Coby Treadway

Darkness Radio takes a look at Season 2, Episode 3 of The Holzer Files and discusses the misunderstood history of the Lincoln Assassination and its ties to The Surratt Tavern in Maryland, the infamous first stop of John Wilkes Booth after assassinating Abraham Lincoln in 1865. 

Coby Treadway joins Dave as the special guest tonight as they spend the first half of the show discussing a fascinating part of history, peeling back the layers of misrepresentation and bringing forth the truth. Later in the episode they discuss

Coby's many haunting experiences, they take questions and comments from the audience and Dave teases the very powerful next episode, Final Word - The Haunting of Franklin Castle!

For more information on Surratt Tavern visit: www.SurrattMuseum.org

For more information on The Holzer Files visit: https://www.travelchannel.com/shows/holzer-files
